description:
Ferid Bathory is the man who killed http://anidb.net/ch70947 [Hyakuya Yuuichirou]`s family when they tried to escape the vampire city. As a Seventh Progenitor vampire, he has much power, but he often speaks nonsense. He seems to be plotting something with the humans behind everyone`s back.
Source: Official Website
name: Ferid Bathory
